tool_description: Quickly consume data from the SIIAU system
name: siiau-api
title: siiau-api

api_list.name: Get payment order
api_list.description: Retrieves the payment order information of the student
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com/paymentorder"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com/paymentorder"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get schedule
api_list.description: Retrieves the schedule of the student from some calendar if specifed. If no calendar passed, then return the last calendar schedule
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com/schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get grades/kardex
api_list.description: Retrieves the grades per subject of the student from some calendar if specifed. Alternatively you can use the kardex endpoint, will produce the same output.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com/grades"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Login status
api_list.description: Check if the credentials are correct
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siiau-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
